info.description: API for managing users, classes, and assembly-related functionality in the Assembly Visual Learning Platform
info.title: Assembly Visual Learning Platform API

get.description: Returns a message indicating the API is ready to accept requests
Retrieve all problems in a specific class

post.description: Create a new problem in a specific class
post.summary: Create a new problem in a class

put.description: Update a problem in a class

delete.description: Delete a problem from a class

put.description: Update a test case for a problem

delete.description: Delete a test case for a specific problem

get.description: Retrieve score for a problem attempt

post.description: Check if the submitted solution matches test case

404.description: Problem or test case not found

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific problem attempt

post.description: Create a new attempt for solving a problem

get.description: Retrieve all test cases for a specific problem
get.summary: Get test cases for a problem

post.description: Create a new test case for a specific problem
post.summary: Create a test case for a problem

get.description: Retrieve a list of all classes

post.description: Create a new class with the provided details and an optional image

get.description: Retrieve a class by its ID

put.description: Update a class with the provided details and an optional image

delete.description: Delete a class by its ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of all users

post.description: Create a new user with the provided details
Send a password reset code to the user's email
Authenticate a user with username and password and return a JWT token
Reset user's password using a verification code

get.description: Retrieve a user by their ID

post.description: Upload a profile picture for the authenticated user

BearerAuth.description: "Enter the token with the `Bearer ` prefix, e.g., `Bearer <token>`"
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
